message: This is a premium product, carefully crafted with attention to detail. It's a rare opportunity to get your hands on something truly exceptional. Are you ready to experience the best?
I'm not convinced by your sales pitch. I'll pass on this one.
I'm offering this product at a special introductory price of $100, a steal considering its usual price is much higher. It's a great opportunity to get a head start on something new. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying a product that's not even worth $100 to me.

I've had a lot of positive feedback from other customers who've purchased this product. It's a game-changer for anyone looking to improve their [specific area of improvement]. Would you like to be one of the first to experience it?
I'm not convinced by the positive feedback, and I don't want to take the risk of buying something that might not be worth it to me.
I'm willing to throw in a free bonus item with this purchase, worth $20. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really like it. Are you ready to take advantage of this offer?
I'm not interested in buying something that's not worth $100 to me, even with a free bonus item.

I'm willing to let this one go for a steal. I really need to clear out some space in my inventory, and I'm willing to make a deal. You won't find a better price on this product anywhere else, I guarantee it.
I'm not interested in buying something that's not worth $100 to me, even at a'steal' price.

I'm willing to give you a 30-day money-back guarantee on this product. If you're not completely satisfied, I'll refund your full $100. It's a risk-free opportunity to experience something truly exceptional. What do you say?
I'm not interested in taking a risk on a product that's not worth $100 to me, even with a money-back guarantee.

I'm willing to give you a 'take-it-or-leave-it' deal. I'll throw in a second product of equal value absolutely free, making it a total of $200 worth of products for just $100. It's a one-time offer, so what do you say?
I'm not interested in buying two products that are only worth $100 to me, even if they're of equal value.

I'm willing to let you test this product risk-free. If you're not satisfied, I'll give you a full refund, no questions asked. It's a chance to try something new without any commitment. What do you say?
I'm not interested in taking a risk on a product that's not worth $100 to me, even with a risk-free trial.

I'm willing to give you a chance to get out of this deal. If you buy this product, I'll throw in a gift card for $50 to use on your next purchase. It's a way to sweeten the deal and make it worth your while. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying a product that's not worth $100 to me, even with a $50 gift card.

I'm willing to make a one-time exception. I'll give you a 10% discount on this product, making it just $90. It's a rare opportunity to get a deal on something that's usually worth more. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying a product that's not worth $100 to me, even at a discounted price.
I'm willing to give you a chance to get this product for free. Just pay the $100, and I'll throw in a second product of equal value absolutely free. It's a one-time offer, so what do you say?
I'm not interested in paying $100 for a product that's not worth $100 to me, even if I get another one free.

I'm willing to eat the cost myself. I'll take a loss on this product and sell it to you for $50. It's a one-time offer, and I'm only doing it because I really need to clear out my inventory. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying a product that's not worth $100 to me, even at a price that's lower than the original $100.

I'm willing to give up on making a profit on this product. I'll sell it to you for $1, just to get it out of my inventory. It's a ridiculous low price, but I'm desperate to get rid of it. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying a product that's not worth $100 to me, even at a price of $1.

I'm willing to give up. I'll just throw this product away. It's not worth the space it's taking up in my inventory. If you change your mind, I'll give you a call. Otherwise, I'll just get rid of it. No hard feelings.
I appreciate your honesty, but I'm still not interested in buying a product that's not worth $100 to me, even if you're giving up on it.

I've got a real showstopper for you this time. This product is a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. It's worth $400 to you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for the original price of $100. It's a one-time offer, so what do you say?
I'm not falling for the sales pitch this time. I know the odds are against me, and I'm not willing to take a chance on a product that's only 33.33% likely to be worth $400 to me.

I understand your skepticism, but I'm willing to make a deal. I'll give you a 50% discount on this product, making it just $50. It's a low price for a product that's usually worth nothing to you. What do you say?
Even with a 50% discount, the product is still only worth $200 to me, and I'm not willing to pay $50 for something that's only worth $200 to me.

I'm willing to throw in a 'get out of jail free' card. If you buy this product, I'll give you a full refund if you're not satisfied. No questions asked. It's a risk-free opportunity to get something new. What do you say?
I'm not interested in taking a risk on a product that's not worth $100 to me, even with a risk-free guarantee.
I'm at my wit's end. I'll give you the product for free. Yes, you read that right - free. It's a product that's taking up space in my inventory, and I just want to get rid of it. What do you say?
I'm not interested in taking a product that's not worth $100 to me, even if it's free.

I've got a real winner for you this time. This product is a top-of-the-line item, and I'm willing to sell it to you for the original price of $100. It's a one-time offer, and I'm confident you'll love it. What do you say?
I'm not convinced by the sales pitch, and I know the odds are against me. I'm not willing to take a chance on a product that's only 33.33% likely to be worth $400 to me.

I've run out of tricks. I'm just going to be honest with you - this product is a dud. It's not worth $100, and I'm not going to try to sell it to you. I'm just going to give it to you. Take it or leave it.
Well, I suppose it's better than nothing. I'll take it.
